parameter.name: hostname
parameter.label: Network Address
parameter.description: The IP or host name of the NAD Receiver

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Port
parameter.description: Port for the NAD Receiver device to control. It uses telnet and therefore by default use port 23.

parameter.name: reconnectInterval
parameter.label: Reconnect Interval
parameter.description: The period in minutes that the handler will wait between connection attempts

parameter.name: heartbeatInterval
parameter.label: Keepalive Heartbeat Interval
parameter.description: The period in minutes between connection heartbeat checks

parameter.name: maxSources
parameter.label: Maximum number of sources
parameter.description: The binding will iterate from 1 to max. number of sources to detect them
